comments:
When I tried to click on a link to an AspectJ-compiled class in a stack trace, 
I received this message:

Unable to instantiate editor: CompilationUnitEditor 
java.lang.IllegalAccessError: tried to access method 
org.eclipse.jdt.ui.text.JavaTextTools.getPreferenceStore()
Lorg/eclipse/jface/preference/IPreferenceStore; from class 
org.eclipse.ajdt.internal.ui.editor.AJSourceViewerConfiguration

I know AspectJ 1.1.9 wasn't tested on 3.0M9, but thought this error would be 
worth keeping in mind as you roll a plugin for M9.

Fixed in CVS, will be in 1.1.10.
